attributes.action: order all MPs to serve on the front line in any war zone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By asking this perhaps all MPs would think twice about declaring war on any state or country for whatever reason - Irak/Afganistan - and sending our own service men and women out without the right equipment to be killed in a war which is not our problem.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
